notes.objectives: This is Demo Template incorporating Grouped Offer functionality

src_author.notes: Image for  listicle author or author tied to a specific ad unit

src.notes: image for ad slot - file that's uploaded

logoUrl.notes: use this field when pulling in an image based on an external storage point using a URL

videoSrc.notes: this field is specific for referencing an external video image when the video image file is too large to upload into the image field

listicle_subheadline.notes: Subheadline for the main listicle headline

cta_list.notes: this is specific for when we want to display an array of CTA text fields within an ad unit/offer-level

control_question_placement.notes: Denotes specific placement of Control Questions

groupOffer.notes: Use this field to group Offers
